CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Moreover , the polymer solar cell as fabricated from the blend of the copolymer and di-perylene bisimide ( di-PBI ) as a non-fullerene electron acceptor exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency of 4.23% with V OC = 0.77 V , J SC = 9.8 mA cm^-2 , and FF = 0.56.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Moreover , the polymer solar cell as fabricated from the blend of the copolymer and di-perylene bisimide ( di-PBI ) as a non-fullerene electron acceptor exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency of 4.23% with V OC = 0.77 V , J SC = 9.8 mA cm^-2 , and FF = 0.56.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| power conversion efficiency |
| VOC (Volts at Open Circuit) |
| J SC (Short Circuit Current Density) |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| blend of the copolymer and di-PBI |
| non-fullerene electron acceptor |
| polymer solar cell |
| fabricated from the blend of the copolymer and di-PBI |
| exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency |
| 4.23% |
| VOC = 0.77 V |
| J SC = 9.8 mA cm^-2 |
| FF = 0.56 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| power conversion efficiency |
| VOC (Volts at Open Circuit) |
| J SC (Short Circuit Current Density) |
| Fill Factor |
| non-fullerene electron acceptor (di-PBI) |
| polymer solar cell |
| exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency of 4.23% |

Note: "promising" is a subjective term and is not considered a material property. Therefore, it was removed from the table.
